Html: I would like to know how I can generate multiple .xlsx files, all with the same structure but with different values in the cells. I have a local server running a local php website, I can only get it to download/generate one file and not multiple files. Does anyone have any ideas?

Instantiate a PHPExcel object, populate cells, instantiate a writer, save;

detach cells and worksheets, and unset PHPExcel object

Instantiate a new PHPExcel object, populate cells, instantiate a writer, save;

repeat as needed
How do I detach cells and worksheets?

With this:

$objPHPExcel->disconnectWorksheets();
unset($objPHPExcel);
     

Please take note that only unsetting the object is not enough
Ok thanks, I didn't realise that unsetting isn't enough. Thanks.
